databaseConnection

Class DatabaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • databaseConnection.DatabaseConnector

  • public class DatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    yoanmartin Class representing an interface between a user and a database. It permits to connect to the database and to execute SQL queries
